attributes.action: Publicly explain why labour controlled areas pay less council tax for the same band property than others
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Surely any given band of council tax payable shouldn't vary depending on the political party controlling the area or vary from region to region. A consistent tax countrywide for each band is fair to all.  PARTY POLITICAL BUSINESS, IS THE BUSINESS OF THE ELECTORATE AND AS SUCH DOES NOT CONSTITUTE GROUNDS FOR REJECTION

rejection.details: This system is designed for people to petition the PM or the Government, not the Labour Party
